name: Detail - Shop drawings to be submitted for approval.
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Approved IFC Shop Drawings
Detail - Concrete mix design to be submitted for approval prior to concrete being supplied to site.
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Minimum compressive strength at 28 days 60MPa. The mix design to comply with aspects of the contract specification.
Detail - Lift design provided for units demoulding, storage and transportation.
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Specific Lift design (Lifting eyes and position) produced and followed
Detail - Mill certificates for steel reinforcing to be provided
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Steel to be manufactured with ACRS certificate details and verification
○ Mill certificates to match ACRS certificates.
Records - Mill Certificates Detail sheets Test Certificates
Detail - Mill certificates for prestressing strand coils to be provided
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Prestressing strands (coils) to be supplied by ACRS accredited Manufacturer.
○ Mill certificates checked against size, type and strand - mill certificate to match ACRS certificate
Detail - Design stressing calculation and calibration certificates to be submitted to the Design Engineer
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Expected extensions and gauge readings to be calculated for each cast.
Records - Design Stressing Calculation Calibration Certificates  Client Approval
Detail - Steel reinforcing cage to be assembled and inspected.
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Cage assembly to comply with correct size, class, length, shape and location/spacing as specified in shop Dwgs.
Records - Pre-Pour Inspection sheet REO detail sheets
Detail - Before casting ensure mould has been prepared to comply with tolerances.
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Measure
Conformance Criteria - Tolerance on placement of moulds shall be a per NZS 3109
Detail - Review actual strand extension/pressure compliance with approved design calculation. Draw-in measurements to be taken and recorded
○ Check that debonding has been included as required. Debonding shell be by plastic sleeves around the strand.
Reference - Approved shop drawings Design Stressing calculation
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Visual Inspection/Measure
Conformance Criteria - Stressing data/records reported on stressing calculation sheet.
Records - Stressing Calculation sheet Pre-Pour Inspection sheet
Detail - Reinforcing steel shall be handled, placed as per NZS 3109.
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Steel reinforcing cage placed as per approved shop drawings.
○ Spacers shall be installed evenly to ensure correct cover as per shop drawings achieved.
Detail - All cast in items positioned as per shop drawings Lifters positioned as per lift design
Reference - NZS3109 Table 5.1 Approved shop drawings Approved Lift Design
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Correct type and number of cast in items used Correct Lifters used, positioned in accordance with approved lift design
Detail - Pre Pour Inspection shall be carried out before casting.
○ The Engineer's Rep shall be advised at least 48 hours before the proposed pour.
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Measure, Document review
Conformance Criteria - Confirmation that the unit has been cast in accordance with approved shop drawings and NZ standards for tolerances.
Records - Pre Pour inspection sheet Marked up shop drawing, Stressing records
Detail - All concrete dockets reviewed at time of delivery.
Frequency - Prior to placement of concrete
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - All concrete delivered to site shall be produced  in accordance with the approved mix design
Detail - Fresh concrete to be visually assessed for its workability compliance.
Frequency - Prior to placement of concrete
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Workability as per mix design.
○ Concrete slump test to be performed by concrete supplier before delivery
Detail - Concrete to be placed to achieve the specified formed and unformed finishes
Frequency - During and after placement of concrete
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - ST Beam to be Type F4 finish
○ All construction joints - Type B / UNO
○ Top surface  Type B / CJ and U2 where specified
Detail - Heat accelerrated curing as per approved methodology.
○ 7 Day post mould water curing as per approved methodology
Frequency - Prior to every unit transfer
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Testing (Schmidt hammer or Compressive strength test)
Conformance Criteria - Minimum compressive strength at transfer of prestressed units to be 40MPa prior to stripping and demoulding.

Detail - Visual inspection to ensure strands are tight and no slippage of strand into concrete. Locallised spalling around full bonded strand at transer as result of excessive slippage will be identified as non conformance and the unit will be rejected and remade.
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Stressing data/records reported on stressing calculation sheet.
Detail - Strand draw-in to be measured on each cast. If ave draw-in for group exceeds 2mm, or 4mm for single strand,  then results to be submitted to Eng
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Measure
Conformance Criteria - Draw-in to be measured on each beam at transfer
Detail - Units are to be demoulded following lift design
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Approved lift design to be  followed.
Detail - Units are to be clearly marked each end with unique number, cast date and installation direction (Super T).
Frequency - Every unit - after demoulding, prior storing
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure every unit is clearly marked
Detail - Concrete compressive strength test to be carried out by supplier. 1 Set per beam with additional set for any truck with water added after leaving the batch plant
Frequency - 1 test sample for every beam [1 cylinder - at 7 days age, 3 cylinders - at 28 days age, 3 cylinders - transfer strength]
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Testing
Conformance Criteria - Compressive Strength result to be a minimum orf 60MPa at 28 days
Responsibility - Concrete Supplier +  Production / Quality Coordinator
Detail - All units shall be inspected for its compliance prior to delivery
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Confirmation that the unit has been cast in accordance with approved shop drawings and NZ standards
Records - Post-Pour Inspection sheet (red pen mark-up - as-built)
Detail - Compliance documentation is to be collated as per project requirements
Inspection / Test Method (submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Compliance documentation is to be submitted to the Engineer.
Records - Post Pour inspection sheet Marked up shop drawings - as built
